titleStmt.title: The safest convoy, or, The strongest helper declared in a valedictory sermon before the Right Honourable Sr. Thomas Bendish, Baronet, His Majesties ambassadour ... / deliverd by Nathanaell Hardy.
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nathanael Web and William Grantham,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
